about_the_game:
There is only one rule in war: Protect your territory!

This is a turn-based strategy shooting game where each round lasts only a few seconds, delivering fast-paced and thrilling tactical battles! In this battlefield, numbers mean power—build strong units, seize territories, and claim victory!

Precisely calculate the movement, rotation, and collision of your units to land them on power-up zones. At the end of each turn, all units in special zones will gain buffs or take damage. Can you take control of the battlefield and put your enemies at a disadvantage? Your success depends on strategy, courage, and a bit of luck!

Master Strategy & Timing

Control the battlefield—strengthen your army while preventing your enemies from growing! Every shot counts. Use physics-based angles and bounces to turn impossible situations into opportunities and pull off incredible turnarounds!

Game Features

✅ **Fast-Paced, Quick Battles** 🎯

Each match lasts around ten minutes, making it easy to jump in anytime. Whether you're a casual player or a competitive strategist, there's fun waiting for you!

✅ **Simple Controls, Deep Strategy** 🖱

Only a mouse is needed to aim and shoot, but mastering the battlefield requires planning and skill! Earn time and turn-based rewards to make later levels easier!

✅ **Unlimited Retries, Perfect Your Strategy** 🔄

No restrictions! Whether you're optimizing for the fastest clear or attempting daring counterattacks, you can keep retrying to refine your tactics!

✅ **Demo vs. Full Version** 🎮

The demo includes 10 carefully designed levels, while the full version expands to **50 main stages + 50 challenge stages**, offering 100 unique battlefields with endless tactical possibilities!

name: Multiple Territory War Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-6500 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730 or ATI R260
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080P
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8500 or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1030 or Radeon RX550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080P

short_description: This is a turn-based shooting and strategy game where victory is achieved by occupying all territories. Power is determined by numbers—the stronger you are, the more dominant you become on the battlefield.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Ukrainian, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean, Tamil
